data.text:
@HappyCustomer24 Hi! 

Okay! If you are using a VPN or possibly Safari as your browser then that may be the problem. Please try closing the VPN or another browser.

Kind regards,
Dennis

@intrepidologist Hi! 

Okay, you can call the lost & found department in Svalbard in that case so they can help you have a look at what they found: +47 417 06 693

Kind regards,
Dennis

data.text:
@oldalts2 @oldalts2 Due to the pilot strike the handling time is longer. If you have a CaseID your case is registered in our system. We have deployed all the resources we can to speed up the process and deal with all cases in turn. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@mamler Hi @mamler! 
Please contact our Customer Service with your booking reference, We will be happy to assist you with your problem.
You can find our contacts here: https://t.co/b3QIqPkF0R - Please select your region in the drop down menu.
Kind regards, Lena

@bigGeefa Hi, 
As a result of the pilot strike, we have a lot of cases to deal with. We have deployed all the resources we can to speed up the process and deal with all cases in turn. The normal handling time is 6-8 weeks but it can take longer at this moment. 
Best regards,
Stina

data.text:
@KARORERODavid1 @KARORERODavid1 Hi, I am sorry to hear that you've had a bad experience with us. If you would like to submit your comments or complaints, please contact our Customer Care department via this link: https://t.co/cXegpq56aG
Kind regards, Mikael.

@CharlesDhital @CharlesDhital Hi, as a result of the pilot strike, we have a lot of cases to deal with. If you have a CaseID, your case is registered in our system. We have deployed all the resources we can to speed up the process. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@field_trips_ @field_trips_ Hi, please contact the baggage service at the airport where you landed and they will assist you https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Mikael

data.text:
@LarsJ3 @LarsJ3 Hej, tyvärr vet jag inte varför du fått den informationen, men du kan kontakta oss via vår live chat så kan vi se över vilken information vi har gällande ditt ärende https://t.co/cIkJt9kPnF Jag beklagar förvirringen.
Vänlig hälsning, Mikael

@LarsJ3 @LarsJ3 Hej, du behöver inte ha en sådan fullmakt om du söker kompensation till dig själv, det är endast om du företräder en resenär som inte bor i samma hushåll som dig.
Vänlig hälsning, Mikael.

@kjinthesticks @kjinthesticks Hi, I am sorry to hear your bags are delayed. For more information, please contact the baggage service at the airport: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@Jjcc21S Hi, You can read about the latest information we have regarding Covid here https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De
If you need more detailed information, we recommend that you contact your local authorities or the respective country's embassy. King regards, Bahare

@TomSimp25393663 Hi! 

Okay! There might be something technical with the flight in that case, as they didn't update the systems. But the best i can recommend is to ask the ground crew for more information as they should know more about it.

Kind regards,
Dennis

@TomSimp25393663 Hi! 

SK 794 wasn't delayed, and should have departed as planned 14:00 from Nice.

Kind regards, 
Dennis

lost and found items will also be displayed on this website within 24 hours: https://t.co/ypJMg5gAxZ

Dennis

The lounge at Gothenburg-Landvetter is open Monday–Friday, but are sadly closed on the weekends.

Dennis

@ChiRN87 @ChiRN87 Hi, as a result of the pilot strike, we have a lot of cases to deal with. We have deployed all the resources we can to speed up the process and deal with all cases in turn. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Kind regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@swenglishcake Hi! You are only allowed 2 pieces of hand luggage on the plane, so if the poster tube does not fit in one of the ones you already have, you will have to check it or one of the bags in. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

urls.title: SAS | Scandinavian Airlines – Book Your Next Flight on Flysas.com
urls.description: With SAS you are part of a community experiencing easy, joyful, and reliable services delivered the Scandinavian way – SAS Airlines makes your travel easier »

data.text:
@Martin723ww Hi! We do not have any information about this at present, but if we decide to offer quadruple points again this year we will post the information to https://t.co/BlgfvhVmSK
Kind Regards, Natasha

@Meghatron5 Hi! We do not have a call-up service, so in this case you will need to call us again. 
Kind Regards, Natasha

@Daveocracy @Daveocracy Our website should show available tickets from 5th of September this year.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@Daveocracy @Daveocracy Hi, if you use the calendar instead of specific dates when you search for tickets, you will get an overview of the month. So it's easier to find dates when there are available tickets.
Kind regards, Mikael

urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @TrudeBasso Hi! If you contact our phones or live chat we might be able to help you. Here can you find all contact information and also our live chat: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj You are very welcome to contact us there and our live agents will do their best to help you. Best regards. Sandy
